name: The observation
description:
Platformer based game, which for now, is only in a "Prototype" stage.
You should explore to find exit(s)..

Note:
The game currently has 3 levels:
Two on the first level.. If you have returned back to the menu - that means you successfully finished one of two levels. Thank you :)

My thoughts:

I didn't have much time to work on a project, and I thought of leaving, but I wanted to make some "core mechanics" and make this "prototype" my starting point: first time developing game, literally never done it before. And it was nice :) Though the time limit got me frustrated: I felt like a week was long enough, so I was doing a lot of "anything but making a game".. ;0 But the burden of "you have to do it, because you signed for it".. was really stressful.. (a bit hard to explain). In the end, I decided to post something and hear feedback around the idea. Most sounds are not included due to lack of skills and "willing time". Thank you for playing!

Game should have had storyline, in witch you play for the creature - subject of an experiment, that was either trying to finish tests or to escape.
